sentences.sentence: The lawyer shafted the prisoner into an admission of guilt.

sentences.sentence: Mexico City is shafted not by regulations or by drug lords or by companies, but by geography.

sentences.sentence: They will ponificate at length, promise much, and 98% of the world will still get shafted as per usual .
